verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> and Silvanus, <S%G4610><s%> and Timotheus, <S%G5095><s%> to the church <S%G1577><s%> of the Thessalonians <S%G2331><s%> which is in God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and in the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ: <S%G5547><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> be to you, and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from God <S%G2316><s%> our Father, <S%G3962><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
We give thanks <S%G2168><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for you all, <S%G3956><s%> making <S%G4160><s%> mention <S%G3417><s%> of you in our prayers; <S%G4335><s%>

Remembering <S%G3421><s%> without <S%G89><s%> ceasing <S%G89><s%> your <S%G5209><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> and labor <S%G2873><s%> of love, <S%G25><s%> and patience <S%G5281><s%> of hope <S%G1680><s%> in our Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> in the sight <S%G1715><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> and our Father; <S%G3962><s%>
Knowing, <S%G1492><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> beloved, <S%G25><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> election <S%G1589><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For our gospel <S%G2098><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> not to you in word <S%G3056><s%> only, <S%G3440><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> in power, <S%G1411><s%> and in the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> and in much <S%G4183><s%> assurance; <S%G4136><s%> as you know <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3634><s%> manner <S%G3634><s%> of men we were among <S%G1722><s%> you for your <S%G5209><s%> sake.

And you became <S%G1096><s%> followers <S%G3402><s%> of us, and of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> having received <S%G1209><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> in much <S%G4183><s%> affliction, <S%G2347><s%> with joy <S%G5479><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>
So <S%G5620><s%> that you were ensamples <S%G5179><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> that believe <S%G4100><s%> in Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> and Achaia. <S%G882><s%>

For from you sounded <S%G1837><s%> out the word <S%G3056><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> not only <S%G3440><s%> in Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> and Achaia, <S%G882><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> in every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> to God-ward <S%G4314><s%> <S%G2316><s%> is spread <S%G1831><s%> abroad; <S%G1831><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that we need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> not to speak <S%G2980><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing.

For they themselves <S%G846><s%> show <S%G518><s%> of us what <S%G3697><s%> manner <S%G3697><s%> of entering <S%G1529><s%> in we had <S%G2192><s%> to you, and how <S%G4459><s%> you turned <S%G1994><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> from idols <S%G1497><s%> to serve <S%G1398><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> and true <S%G228><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%>

And to wait <S%G362><s%> for his Son <S%G5207><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> even Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> delivered <S%G4506><s%> us from the wrath <S%G3709><s%> to come. <S%G2064><s%>
